name: Elysian Ascent
description:
Elysian Ascent is a single player 2D platformer whose difficulty lies in overcoming harsh environments. But be careful; a single misstep is all it takes for you to plummet back down towards your previously conquered areas.  Take control of Gaius, a Roman centurion who has accepted the Gods' challenge of making the arduous ascent to Elysium in order to become the first mortal to claim their status as a deity!

  • Tight 2D platforming with easy to learn controls that are hard to master
  • A magical sword you can throw through walls and will always return to you
  • Ascend 5 different areas each with their own unique mechanics and beautifully drawn pixel environments
  • Challenging collectibles to obtain on every screen
  • Twitch integration to allow your viewers to inflict your game with wacky modifications, both good and bad
